description: - Git Alias ```bash git config --global init.defaultBranch dev ``` - Extens√µes do vscode (Eslint, EditorConfig For VS Code) - Adicionar  a seguinte regra no settings.json do vscode  ```javascript  "editor.formatOnSave": true,    "prettier.requireConfig": true,    "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {      "source.fixAll.eslint": true    }, ```
